biotools.summary: Estimates gene-specific phenotypes from off-target confounded RNAi screens. The phenotype of each siRNA is modeled based on on-targeted and off-targeted genes, using a regularized linear regression model.

bioschemas.name: gespeR
bioschemas.summary: Estimates gene-specific phenotypes from off-target confounded RNAi screens. The phenotype of each siRNA is modeled based on on-targeted and off-targeted genes, using a regularized linear regression model.
